Topic.Title: How to make additional space like a backpack?

Posts.EditableText:
How do I make a backpack?
I made 12 cheeseburgers in my game. They're needed to defeat the 12 Beefy Sea Slugs. Frybo's is having a cheeseburger giveaway! I need a backpack to handle all these cheeseburgers!
Please help me.
Game link here. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tu-ceu4k5eqd0m0ztu7zya/steven-universe-new-beginnings

Posts.EditableText: Actually, I think I'll try ```this.parent = backpack```...
Yeah, that ought to do it. Thanks.
